data.eml:eml: Titanobochica, surprising discovery of a new cave-dwelling genus from southern Portugal (Arachnida: Pseudoscorpiones: Bochicidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reboleira, Ana Sofia P. S., Zaragoza, Juan A., Gonçalves, Fernando, Oromí, Pedro (2010): Titanobochica, surprising discovery of a new cave-dwelling genus from southern Portugal (Arachnida: Pseudoscorpiones: Bochicidae). Zootaxa 2681: 1-19, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.199333
